paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the His88Arg variant in the TTR gene, including penetrance data from two case reports.

individual_records.phenotype_details: transthyretin amyloidosis cardiomyopathy with progression of LV hypertrophy and systolic dysfunction
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The first case is a 50-year-old male patient diagnosed with transthyretin amyloidosis cardiomyopathy with His88Arg mutation.

individual_records.phenotype_details: heart failure caused by ATTRv cardiomyopathy with exacerbation of lung congestion and pleural effusion
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The second case was a 63-year-old woman with heart failure (HF) caused by ATTRv cardiomyopathy with a His88Arg mutation.

functional_data.summary: No specific functional data provided in the paper.

variants.additional_notes: Both patients showed severe symptoms and did not respond to treatment.
key_quotes: The two cases showed that treatment with patisiran for the patients with advanced stage of His88Arg ATTRv cardiomyopathy was unable to stop the progression of HF.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
